mapper.select: SELECT m_report_no AS memberReportNo, m_no AS memberNo, m_target_no AS memberTargetNo, type_code AS typeCode, m_report_reason AS memberReportReason, m_report_date AS memberReportDate, status_code AS statusCode FROM member_report WHERE status_code IN ('S010601', 'S010603');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_report (m_no, m_target_no, type_code, m_report_reason, m_report_date, status_code) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{memberTargetNo}, #{typeCode}, #{reasonDetail}, NOW(), 'S010601')
